sen.e: ABE no Muneaki (the dates of birth and death unknown) was a yin-yang diviner in the late Heian period.

sen.j: 子に天文博士図書頭安倍広賢がいた。

sen.j: 天文博士を務め、地震や天体の異変に際し、度々朝廷に天文奏を奉っている。
sen.e: Serving as Tenmon Hakase, when earthquakes or unusual changes in celestial bodies occurred, he repeatedly laid Tenmonso (divination of natural disasters) to the Court.
